alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:39PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Niobrara County through 930 PM MDT... At 838 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Lance Creek, or 14 miles north of Lusk, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Redbird around 905 PM MDT. Mule Creek Junction around 920 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Wyoming.
